prompts: Create a grass-type Pokemon that has a turtle-like appearance with a leafy head.
I want a small, adorable Pokemon that resembles a turtle and is primarily green.
Generate a Pokemon design that features a brown shell and a green body with a plant on top.
Make a cute Pokemon with a round shape, a smiling face, and a small leaf on its head.
Imagine a Pokemon that lives in forests and has earthy colors, evoking a sense of nature.
Design a Pokemon that looks like a baby turtle, emphasizing its connection to the grass type.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies calmness and nature, with a distinct shell and leaf feature.
